tbl-colwidths: [15,10, 55, 25]

## Schedule and course materials

For Qmd files (markdown document with [Quarto](https://quarto.org/docs/authoring/markdown-basics.html) which are cross-language executable code), go to the [course GitHub repository](https://github.com/mbutler808/mbutler808.github.io/) and navigate the directories, or best of all clone the repo and navigate within RStudio or your text browser and R console.
